My Projects

Check out some of my Projects......


Desc:

Python File Sharing App


A Windows App based on Socket Programming using python which can act both as a server or a client at a time for shring of data. Data loss is minimum and Transfer Speed is very High.

 Get it on Drive!    Github

Desc:

File Type searcher and player


A C++ program (based on C++17) that has the capability to search a specific type of data and can even open it with the predefined resources available to the user system (works on both linux and windows).

 Get it on Drive!    Github

Desc:

Python VlC player Streamer


A Keylog based program that has the capabilty to send and stream data at the same time.It uses VlC to recognise the keylogs and stream the media.

 Get it on Drive!    Github

Desc:

An Practical Implementation of Playground Tensorflow Neural Net


Based on what I learned from the tensorflow playground, created a neural net algorithm only using numpy which can classify data as like the playground

 Get it on Drive!    Github

Desc:

Voice Recognition and Obstacle-Avoiding robot using Arduino


Using Arduino Uno Board and some cheap yet effective hardware, created robots that can avoid obstacles and also can recognise voice commands. Uses Low Energy power modules.

 Get it on Drive!    Github

Desc:

Process Specific Keylogger


A python based keylogger that uses the concept of process identifications to keylog the keypresses only when a certain application is on the active gui window.

 Get it on Drive!    Github
